TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlnsPrefixAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlnsPrefixAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlnsPrefixAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 当在 XAML 文件（序列化）中编写元素和特性时，或与具有 XAML 编辑功能的设计环境进行交互时，标识要与 XAML 命名空间关联用于 XAML 的推荐前缀。

span.span: Identifies a recommended prefix to associate with a XAML namespace for XAML usage, when writing elements and attributes in a XAML file (serialization) or when interacting with a design environment that has XAML editing features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 处理器或合并 XAML 或执行 XAML 序列化的任何进程的框架通常应遵循的建议的前缀。XAML processors or frameworks that incorporate XAML, or any process that performs XAML serialization, should generally honor the recommended prefix. 前缀可能有必要在任何情况下在从原始的 XAML 源中的特定映射的前缀不以某种方式在运行时对象图中保留或否则存储 framework 或技术。The prefix might be necessary in any case where prefixes from specific mappings in the original XAML source are not somehow preserved in the runtime object graph or otherwise stored by a framework or technology. 框架可能都具有有关如何序列化忽略的建议的前缀从其自己的程序集; 其自身类型的特定首选项这可能会为了一致地提升默认 XAML 命名空间。A framework might have specific preferences for how to serialize its own types that ignore the recommended prefix from its own assemblies; this might be done to consistently promote a default XAML namespace. 但是，此类框架仍应提供建议的前缀，其 XAML 类型的可能第三方和工具的用法。However, such a framework should still provide recommended prefixes for possible third-party and tool usages of its XAML types. 请参阅下面的"最佳做法的 XAML 设计器支持或常规序列化"的部分。See "Best Practice for XAML Designer Support or General Serialization" section below. 前缀，一般建议是使用短字符串，因为前缀通常应用于来自 XAML 命名空间的所有序列化元素。A general recommendation for prefixes is to use short strings, because the prefix is typically applied to all serialized elements that come from the XAML namespace. 前缀字符串的长度可以序列化的 XAML 输出的大小很明显的影响。The prefix string length can have a noticeable effect on the size of serialized XAML output. 如果所请求的前缀已由另一个之前遇到/序列化的 XAML 命名空间标识符使用，则行为是未指定 （行为是最多每个单独的 XAML 处理器实现）。If a prefix being requested is already in use by another previously encountered/serialized XAML namespace identifier, the behavior is unspecified (behavior is up to each individual XAML processor implementation). 在大多数情况下，你将应用仅当还应用了至少一个该相同的 XAML 命名空间的程序集中。In most cases, you apply only if you have also applied at least one in the assembly for that same XAML namespace. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## XAML 设计器支持或常规序列化的最佳做法Best Practice for XAML Designer Support or General Serialization 即使你想要在您的框架或库的大多数使用情况情况下的默认 XAML 命名空间的关联的 XAML 命名空间，你应仍指定非空字符串作为 XAML 命名空间的建议前缀。Even if you intend the associated XAML namespace to be the default XAML namespace in most usage cases for your framework or library, you should still specify a non-empty string as the recommended prefix for a XAML namespace. 单独的 XAML 文件和 XAML 节点流中携带有默认 XAML 命名空间信息。Default XAML namespace information is carried in individual XAML files and XAML node streams. 默认 XAML 命名空间和如何在给定的 XAML 源中定义就可以轻松地永久保留每个用例的序列化而无需使用。The default XAML namespace and how it is defined in a given XAML source can easily be perpetuated for per-case serialization without using . 但是，对于 XAML 作者已选择要映射到其他内容的默认 XAML 命名空间的情况下非常有用。However, the is useful for cases where the XAML author has chosen to map the default XAML namespace to something else. 在这种情况下，XAML 文本编辑器嵌入在设计环境可以使用作为初始 XAML 命名空间提示`xmlns`映射。In this scenario a XAML text editor embedded in a design environment can use as a hint for an initial XAML namespace `xmlns` mapping. 或设计环境可以添加对如拖动工具箱出来放入一个可视化设计图面的对象的设计隐喻的支持 XAML 中实时映射。Or a design environment can add just-in-time mappings to the backing XAML for design metaphors such as dragging objects out of a toolbox and into a visual design surface. 此外，它是传入的设计器无法同时支持多个 XAML 启用框架，并且具有一个常见 XAML 序列化程序依赖于.NET Framework XAML 服务，而不是特定于框架的序列化。Also, it is conceivable that a designer could simultaneously support multiple XAML-enabling frameworks, and has a common XAML serializer that relies on .NET Framework XAML Services rather than framework-specific serialization. 指定为这些方案可帮助使 XAML 用法程序的类型更可移植和可靠如果 XAML 设计工具之间交换或进行 XAML 编辑器和其他如标记编译器的使用者之间的往返或其他序列化。Specifying a for these scenarios helps make the XAML usage for your types more portable and robust if the XAML is exchanged between design tools, or undergoes a round trip between XAML editors and other consumers such as markup compilers or other serialization.

summary.span: 获取与此属性关联的 XAML 命名空间标识符。

span.span: Gets the XAML namespace identifier associated with this attribute.
